biotools.summary: The DiSNEP package implemented the Disease-Specific Network Enhancement Prioritization (DiSNEP) framework. The DiSNEP framework first enhances a comprehensive gene network specifically for a disease through a diffusion process on a gene-gene similarity matrix derived from a disease omics data. The enhanced disease-specific gene network thus better reflects true gene interactions for the disease and may improve prioritizing disease-associated genes subsequently.

bioschemas.name: DiSNEP
